javadoc:
Adapter class that receives notifications in order to provide drag over effects.

When the operation ends, this class receives a dragDropEnd message, and is responsible for checking the success of the operation. If the operation was successful, and if it was a Move, then this class will remove the source data.

methods.javadoc:
Constructor
@param dragComponent component that can be dragged.
methods.name: <init>

methods.javadoc:
Called when the drag-drop operation completes.
 Calls the drag component's move() method if the action is a
 move operation.
methods.name: dragDropEnd
methods.comment:
Called when the drag-drop operation completes.
 Calls the drag component's move() method if the action is a
 move operation.

methods.javadoc: Called as the hotspot enters a platform dependent drop site.
methods.name: dragEnter
methods.comment: Called as the hotspot enters a platform dependent drop site.

methods.javadoc: Called as the hotspot moves over a platform dependent drop site.
methods.name: dragOver
methods.comment: Called as the hotspot moves over a platform dependent drop site.

methods.javadoc: Called as the hotspot exits a platform dependent drop site.
methods.name: dragExit
methods.comment: Called as the hotspot exits a platform dependent drop site.

methods.javadoc:
Drop action changed, i.e., ctrl key pressed during drag to
 change to a copy operation.
methods.name: dropActionChanged
methods.comment:
Drop action changed, i.e., ctrl key pressed during drag to
 change to a copy operation.
